200.description: Returns JWT access token and user payload

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search stores by name or description

get.description: Returns stores within a specified radius of the given coordinates, sorted by distance. Uses the Haversine formula to calculate distances in kilometers.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the search center point

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the search center point

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius in kilometers (default: 10km, max: 50 results)

200.description: Returns array of stores with calculated distance field, ordered by proximity

patch.summary: Admin: manage store verification / active status
Admin: enable or disable a product

200.description: Returns store bookmarks for the user
Returns product bookmarks for the user

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file to serve

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file to delete

400.description: No file uploaded or invalid file

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by subscription name or description (admin only)

get.summary: Get active subscription for a user

post.description: Retailers can join a subscription by ID. If they already have an active subscription, it will be cancelled first.

400.description: Invalid input or subscription not found

patch.description: Retailers can update their active subscription to a different subscription plan by ID.

400.description: No active subscription found or subscription not found

post.description: Retailers can cancel their active subscription. The subscription status will be set to CANCELLED.

get.description: Returns comprehensive subscription analytics including counts by status, plan, billing cycle, revenue metrics, and trends.
